title: Castle Rock Episode 9 - Promo Breakdown
author: Think Story
comment:
Why are we all so crazy about this series? Why are we addicted to it?
I can not wait to see how it goes on and how this story will end.
I think by the end of this season, I'll be the one locked up in a cage or basement somewhere.  🤪

Stumbled across the this channel thanks to Castle Rock.

Pray that you do more series breakdowns after Caste Rock finishes. You are (without hyperbole) fantastic!
Your videos are amazing! Wish you did more shows like this!!
description:
Part of my companion piece that breaks down the preview/promo for the next episodes of Castle Rock. This is for episode 9, "Henry Deaver."
